testCases.explanation: Edges [1,2] and [1,3] form a tree; [2,3] is the redundant edge that creates a cycle.
[1,4] is the last edge that creates a cycle in the 1-2-3-4 loop.
[3,4] is the last edge added that creates a cycle.

description:
Solve the **Redundant Connection** problem.

In an undirected graph of n nodes (labeled 1 to n), one additional edge was added to a tree. Find and return that redundant edge. If multiple answers exist, return the last edge in the input.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/redundant-connection/).

examples.explanation: [2,3] is the edge that creates a cycle.
